name: ZEROL® 250
description: ZEROL® 250 lubricant range is based on synthetic Alkylbenzene (AB) and has been developed for use in refrigeration, heat pumps and air conditioning compressors. The miscibility of ZEROL lubricants with hydrofluorocarbon type refrigerants is excellent. Their low floc point, antifoaming properties and good stability at high temperature provides optimum lubrication even under the most severe conditions.
